text: Baroness Karren Rita Brady CBE (born 4 April 1969) is a British businesswoman and television personality. She is a former managing director of Birmingham City F.C. and current vice-chairman of West Ham United F.C. She is also one of Alan Sugar's aides on British version of The Apprentice. In 2014, Brady became a member of the House of Lords. == References == Category:British businesspeople Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Karren Brady
